item.title: Audio Generation with NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX
item.description: This post explores the audio generation capabilities of the NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX. It covers transcribing audio using Whisper, setting up text-to-speech (TTS) and automatic speech recognition (ASR) with Llamaspeak, and preparing the RIVA server for advanced speech AI applications. Detailed instructions and command examples are provided, making it easy for developers to experiment with these tools on the Jetson platform.
